review.text: Bodega is a tapas restaurant on Norfolk's trendy Granby Street. The menu is not traditional tapas, it would probably be more accurate to call it 'small plates.'
The food at Bodega was good, I especially enjoyed the duck breast and the tortellini.
Zarzuela is a tapas restaurant in San Francisco's trendy Russian Hill neighborhood.
Try the 'Callos A La Madrilena' (Madrid style tripe). Don't ask ... just enjoy.
La Tasca is located right nest to the Metra Rail Station in Arlington Heights. It has a 'bar' feel to it and serves excellent inexpensive tapas.
